entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:06 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 01:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: WNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight then southeast 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
